signIn.title: Sign in to your Bridgestars account
signIn.subtitle: Enter your username and password

toast.alreadyIn: dev: You are already signed in, sign out at profile page

signUp.title: Join the Bridgestars waiting list
signUp.subtitle: Enter your desired details below to create an account.

reset.title: Reset your Bridgestars password
reset.subtitle: Enter your email address to reset your password.

toast.passwordReset: Your password has been reset. Please check your email.

error.passError1: Password must be at least 8 characters
error.passError2: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
error.passError3: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
error.passError4: Password must contain at least one digit.
error.notValid: The Email you provided is not valid.
